pullrequest.title: Link to tool for automatic mesh geometry computation and cleanup.

content.raw: Aha, good to know that, I was not sure how Gazebo handles this. Ok, as I said, I like to keep things decluttered, so to that end I have created a tool that lets you visualize and rescale models so that you can then simply use the scaled model to get all the inertia parameters. This is the tool for that: https://www.hamzamerzic.info/3d_viz/
content.html: Aha, good to know that, I was not sure how Gazebo handles this.
